content: There are two ways to be happy: minimize your needs; and live in harmony with the circumstances.
A smiling face is a kind of flower, seeing which the mind of spectators is automatically attracted towards it.
Keep smiling always in all conditions. Be fearless and free from anxiety. Go on doing your duties and be happy.
Every condition of life is auspicious and pleasant for us. Make an effort to keep yourself always happy by adjusting yourself to circumstances.
